sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IMC_AT_BIZ_MSG ( ID, STATUS, PRIORITY, RESERVED_DATE, SENDER_KEY, PHONE_NUMBER, TEMPLATE_CODE, MESSAGE, RESEND_MT_TYPE, RESEND_MT_FROM, RESEND_MT_TO, RESEND_MT_MESSAGE_REUSE ) VALUES ( SEQ_IMC_AT_BIZ_MSG.NEXTVAL, '1', 'N', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #sender_key#, #phone_number#, #template_code#, #message#, 'LM', #resend_mt_from#, #resend_mt_to#, 'Y' )
